wikipedia_page.main: Matthew James Waite (born 24 December 1995) is an English cricketer who plays for Yorkshire County Cricket Club. Primarily a right-handed batsman, he also bowls right-arm fast-medium. In March 2019, in the match against Leeds/Bradford MCCU in the 2019 Marylebone Cricket Club University Matches, Waite took his maiden five-wicket haul in first-class cricket.

response: Methley Cricket Club won the Village Cup national cricket competition at Lord's, in 1998. Yorkshire player Matthew Waite, has represented Methley C.C.
